titleStmt.title: An ordinance for the relief of creditors and poor prisoners. Thursday June 8. 1654. Ordered by his Highness the Lord Protector, and his council, that this ordinance be forthwith printed and published. Henry Scobell, Clerk of the Council.
Orders in Council. 1654-06-08.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lord Protector (1653-1658 : O. Cromwell)
England and Wales. Council of State. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by William du-Gard and Henry Hills, printers to His Highness the Lord Protector,

notesStmt.note: The final leaf bears an order to print dated: June 9. 1654.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
